quotes.author: Homer, The Iliad

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
Here's some neurochemistry/pharmacology 181: Dopamine can and will lead to mania and psychosis if it gets out of control.

Smartphones and social media are like stimulant drugs(coke, meth, bath salts). Not quite as hard, but they're constantly available and for dirt cheap. People use social media and smartphone for the good feelings they get from likes/retweets/(you)s, etc.
This constant bombarding the brain with dopamine is leading to a global psychosis. We're currently seeing this live and hourly.

One of the defining symptoms of psychosis is NOT KNOWING or being able to discern truth from fantasy. The same symptoms are being seen in society right now. If you have wondered why everything seems batshit insane and psychotic, THIS IS WHY. What's worse, people who are psychotic rarely actually know it. Especially stupid people(IQ under 129 or so). Social media and smartphones are literally acting like methamphetamine in the "global" populace right now, and NOBODY seems to be aware of this, which makes sense as pointed out above.

You look closelly at all of these protests/riots. Most people are either using their phones or WILL use their phones within 5 minutes, in the video.
CLEAR addictive behaviors. It's literally like they are doing KEY BUMPS.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: Men who seek comfort are men who can be made into slaves.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: Alas you will bear no fruit. For thou art barren within, and a lying contradiction without

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
Our ancestors have always known that free sexuality would lead to a bad outcome for everyone.
In our hubris, we have decided we know better and started an experiment with consequences that are beginning to show.

Humans are a naturally polygynous species. Comparisons of paternally inherited Y-DNA vs. maternal mDNA show a divergence in genetic diversity such that for every one male, 17 females have reproduced.

Of course, such brutal male selection has the consequence of high male competitiveness and violence.
This is the reason for why we have evolved a sexual dimorphism between the sexes.
In other species, the higher the dimorphism, the less monogamous they are.

The genius of enforcing monogamy in humans led to a 1:1 pairing of the sexes, unlocking a huge amount of male resources previously spent on infighting, a civilization-building feat.
Monogamy has now become optional and even disincentivized, turning back the clock.

So we return to the times of 1 male for 17 females, but since we have laws against murder and rape, and because we have the state providing for single mothers, we have, in the west, nearly disabled natural selection. That leaves us with sexual selection as the distinctor.

This is why the most important male traits are now largely genetic: A large skeleton (height, frame), robust/aesthetic craniofacial bones (jawline, orbital ridge, face), full hair, beard, etc. Women are basically selecting for the strongest caveman without any actual fighting.

Hence the males of lower genetic value are forced to become suicidal, homosexual, transsexual, homicidal, a blue-pilled beta or a cuckold, all of which manifest in males much more often than females.

Much of what we see today is an inevitability of the incentives set up the last decades.
If we continue on this path, it is clear that, without rewarding the subservient male with procreation, civilization cannot be upheld and we will revert to a more primitive state of mankind.

While feminism pretends to fight against male toxicity, it is actually encouraging it.
After all, if given free choice, women will choose the meanest, baddest and most dominant.
No wonder that 513 Shades is the book that has sold the most copies in human history.

In contrast, monogamy pacifies male "toxicity" and leads, applied consequently over long periods of time, to diminished sexual dimorphism.
Monogamy was actually a progressive idea. Today's "progressives" are really regressive. Big irony of our times.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
The search for meaning changes from internal to external,
children are considered in terms of pros and cons - fertility declines,
open mind is closed only to the truth but "open" to each new intellectual fashion because he himself has no intellectual foundation

quotes.author: Seraphim Rose
quotes.body: What, more realistically, is this “mutation,” the “new man”? He is the rootless man, discontinuous with a past that Nihilism has destroyed, the raw material of every demagogue’s dream; the “free-thinker” and skeptic, closed only to the truth but “open” to each new intellectual fashion because he himself has no intellectual foundation; the “seeker” after some “new revelation,” ready to believe anything new because true faith has been annihilated in him; the planner and experimenter, worshipping “fact” because he has abandoned truth, seeing the world as a vast laboratory in which he is free to determine what is “possible”; the autonomous man, pretending to the humility of only asking his “rights,” yet full of the pride that expects everything to be given him in a world where nothing is authoritatively forbidden; the man of the moment, without conscience or values and thus at the mercy of the strongest “stimulus”; the “rebel,” hating all restraint and authority because he himself is his own and only god; the “mass man,” this new barbarian, thoroughly “reduced” and “simplified” and capable of only the most elementary ideas, yet scornful of anyone who presumes to point out the higher things or the real complexity of life.

quotes.author: Marcel Proust
quotes.body: Let us leave pretty women to men with no imagination.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
Imagine when they reach 30% of your population total...The Western leaders are fucking retarded...

First some of them tried to send missionairies, that didn't work

Let's send settlers to build infrastructure? Ooops that didn't work

Let's send troops, settlers and missionairies next, oops that didn't work

Let's leave them be and see what happens now that the infrastructure is built and most of them can read and write...Oops, they devolved into tribalism, rape, loot and genocide again.

Hey!Let's import millions of them to Europe, that couldn't possibly backfire on us right? Ooops, now every country in Europe is about to erupt into civil war because of low-iq pavement apes and our own people are getting pissed off at us for blaming them for our fuck up since the pavement apes are gangraping their children, murdering their sons and daughters, importing drugs and setting up parallell societies...

quotes.author: C.S. Lewis, The Abolition of Man
quotes.body: In a sort of ghastly simplicity we remove the organ and demand the function. We make men without chests and expect of them virtue and enterprise. We laugh at honour and are shocked to find traitors in our midst. We castrate and bid the geldings be fruitful

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: Don't let your worth as a man be determined by a whim of a woman

quotes.author: Abe Simpson
quotes.body: You know, you remind me of a poem I can't remember, and a song that may never have existed, and a place I'm not sure I've ever been to

quotes.author: Sigmund Freud
quotes.body: It can easily be shown that the psychical value of erotic needs is reduced as soon as their satisfaction becomes easy. An obstacle is required in order to heighten libido; and where natural resistances to satisfaction have not been sufficient men have at all times erected conventional ones so as to be able to enjoy love. This is true both of individuals and of nations. In times in which there were no difficulties standing in the way of sexual satisfaction, such as perhaps during the decline of the ancient civilizations, love became worthless and life empty

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: The masks were necessary to make the pandemic feel "real." Without the masks (or the media), you wouldn't even know there was a pandemic. People were never dying out in the streets. It's all one big hoax.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
You see when you are trying to understand what is wrong with the world but do not have the words to articulate you will be trapped in your mind prison.
But when a philosopher describe it with such accuracy you can now see past this maze and your mind becomes a little more free.
And each time you learn to do it, the more free you will be.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: Every act of beauty is a revolt towards the modern world

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: Love isn't the initial attraction. Love isn't the good sex. Love isn't millions of dollars. Love is what is left over when the newness fades, when the excitement dies. Love is the hard part - the part no one cares to push through, understand, or embrace

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body:
Love is an act of the will. It's not this bullshit, cupid's arrow, idealized romance. "Well, maybe I'm with the wrong person" when things go sour. Humans are not capable of unconditional love. You find a woman or man that meets the criteria of an actual good husband or wife. You stay with them and you both work at it. The bullshit roman lie of romance and love has no room for the elderly husband that has to pull his now ailing wife in and out of the car. Every day. Wiping her ass. bathing her feeding her. EVERY DAY until she dies and then being left alone to hopefully see her again one day.
Love is an act of the will.

quotes.author: Carl Jung
quotes.body: Only boldness can deliver from fear. And if the risk is not taken, the meaning of life is somehow violated, and the whole future is condemned to hopeless staleness.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.body: The meaning of the river flowing is not that all things are changing, so that we cannot encounter them twice, but that some things stay the same only by changing

quotes.author: Thomas Sowell
quotes.body: The next time some academics tell you how important diversity is, ask how many Republicans there are in their sociology department.

quotes.author: Thomas Sowell
quotes.body: Can you cite one speck of hard evidence of the benefits of "diversity" that we have heard gushed about for years? Evidence of its harm can be seen — written in blood — from Iraq to India, from Serbia to Sudan, from Fiji to the Philippines. It is scary how easily so many people can be brainwashed by sheer repetition of a word.

quotes.author: Diogenes
quotes.body: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little.

quotes.author: Helmuth von Moltke
quotes.body: Eternal peace is a dream --and not even a beautiful one. War is part of God's world-order. Within it unfold the noblest virtues of men, courage and renunciation, loyalty to duty and readiness for sacrifice--at the hazzard of one's life. Without war the world would sink into a swamp of materialism. Further, I wholly agree with the principle stated in the preface that the gradual progress in morality must also be reflected in the waging of war.
